content: That's really helpful! I think I'll start by incorporating restorative yoga into my morning routine, even if it's just 5-10 minutes. I've been enjoying Rachel's Vinyasa flow class on Tuesdays, and I want to make sure I'm taking care of myself on the other days too. Since I've been going three times a week to the studio, I want to make sure I'm not overdoing it and taking time to rest and recover. Do you have any tips on how to listen to my body and avoid injury or burnout?
